feed.title: Mondlango 世界大同语 Monda lango
feed.subtitle: Monda lango is the common possession of the whole human race, therefore the author of Monda lango (Heyafu...) has resigned all copyrights to Monda lango. Anyone is permitted to copy any of the contents in this website freely.

entry.title: Welcome on mondlango.github.io!
entry.content: Welcome on mondlango.github.io! A website that want to save the data of the old website www.mondlango.com and to publish the work of https://github.com/mondlango/ : a place to create a workable documentation for the Mondlango constructed language.
entry.summary: Welcome on mondlango.github.io! A website that want to save the data of the old website www.mondlango.com and to publish the work of https://github.com/mondlango/ : a place to create a workable documentation for the Mondlango constructed language.
